com.usermanagement.service

Interface UserService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserServiceImpl

    public interface UserService
    An interface containing service layer method declarations for User APIs

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UserDto findByUsername(java.lang.String username)
      Service layer method declaration for retrieving user details by username Initially it checks the username is null or not.
      java.lang.Integer getValidationErrorCode(java.lang.String field, java.lang.String errorType)
      This method defines the custom error code for the validation of given input field
      void saveUser(UserDto userDto)
      Service layer method declaration for User registration.

    • Method Detail

      • saveUser

        void saveUser(UserDto userDto)
       throws CustomException
        Service layer method declaration for User registration. In this method it validates user object whether it has values for all the mandatory fields or not Then it checks whether the user already exists with given username in the input object Then the userDto object will be mapped to User object and saved to the database if all the validations are success
        Parameters:
        userDto - The Dto object from the API, not null
        Throws:
        CustomException - Error which specifies exact reason for the validation failure

      • findByUsername

        UserDto findByUsername(java.lang.String username)
                throws CustomException
        Service layer method declaration for retrieving user details by username Initially it checks the username is null or not. It retrieves the user object, map to userDto object and return to the API if the username is not null, otherwise it throws custom exception with corresponding error message
        Parameters:
        username - Username of the user whose details have to be retrieved
        Returns:
        A valid UserDto object which contain all the details of the user
        Throws:
        CustomException - Error which specifies exact reason for the validation failure

      • getValidationErrorCode

        java.lang.Integer getValidationErrorCode(java.lang.String field,
                                         java.lang.String errorType)
        This method defines the custom error code for the validation of given input field
        Parameters:
        field - input field in the UserDto object
        errorType - Reason for the validation failure such as AgeLimit, NotNull etc.
        Returns:
        Gives corresponding custom validation error code of the given field
